popover.primary: A mastery path focused on dealing damage to a single, far-away enemy.
popover.secondary: Bow counts 100% of its dps to abilities, sword counts 45%.

popover.primary: A mastery path focused on fighting in melee combat.
popover.secondary: Sword counts 100% of its dps towards abilities.

popover.primary: A mastery path focused on fighting multiple enemies at medium range.
popover.secondary: Bow counts 100% of its dps to abilities, sword counts 45%.

data.name: Acid Arrow
data.description: An attack which deals 328 damage and reduces your target's armor by 618 and reduces their chance to block by 10% for 10 seconds.
data.rawDescription: An attack which deals {COM_0_VAL0_DAMAGE} and reduces your target's armor by {COM_1_VAL0} and reduces their chance to block by {COM_2_VAL0}% for {COM_1_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Assault Stance
data.description:
A close-combat stance which increases your Strength and Weapon Skill by 120, and increases your Armor by the same amount that you receive from items.

While in Assault Stance your ranged prowess item stats will count towards your melee prowess in a 1 to 1 conversion respectively. Parry chance is increased by 10%, Autoattack damage is increased by 65%. Additionally you have a 25% chance on melee attacks to increase your Autoattack speed by 33%.

You may only use a single Stance at a time.
data.rawDescription:
A close-combat stance which increases your Strength and Weapon Skill by {COM_0_VAL0}, and increases your Armor by the same amount that you receive from items.

While in Assault Stance your ranged prowess item stats will count towards your melee prowess in a 1 to 1 conversion respectively. Parry chance is increased by 10%, Autoattack damage is increased by 65%. Additionally you have a 25% chance on melee attacks to increase your Autoattack speed by 33%.

You may only use a single Stance at a time.

data.name: Barrage
data.description:
Deals 278 damage to all enemies in an arc in front of you, up to 40 feet away.
If you are Vengeful, this attack removes 100 points of morale from the enemy.
data.rawDescription:
Deals {COM_0_VAL0_DAMAGE} to all enemies in an arc in front of you, up to {COM_0_RADI_FEET} away.
If you are Vengeful, this attack removes 100 points of morale from the enemy.

data.name: Bend the Winds
data.description: Increases your Elemental resistance by 252.
data.rawDescription: Increases your Elemental resistance by {COM_0_VAL0}.

data.name: Blood-Soaked War
data.description: Any time you kill an enemy, you will instantly regain 321 health.
data.rawDescription: Any time you kill an enemy, you will instantly regain {ABIL_3039_COM_0_VAL0_HEALTH}.

data.name: Broadhead Arrow
data.description: An Ailment which deals 660 damage to your target over 15 seconds. Stacks up to 3 times.
data.rawDescription: An Ailment which deals {COM_1_VAL0_TOD_DAMAGE} to your target over {COM_1_DURA_SECONDS}. Stacks up to 3 times.

data.name: Brutal Assault
data.note:
Target must be facing away from you
Requires Assault or Skirmish Stance
data.description:
Deals 302 damage to your target, and makes monsters hate you less than normal. Only usable when you are behind the target.
If you are Vengeful, then this attack may be used from any position.
data.rawDescription:
Deals {COM_0_VAL0_DAMAGE} to your target, and makes monsters hate you less than normal. Only usable when you are behind the target.
If you are Vengeful, then this attack may be used from any position.

data.name: Bullseye
data.description: Whenever you critically hit an enemy, your chance to critically hit is increased by 20% for 5 seconds, but you also become 10% more vulnerable to being critically hit.
data.rawDescription: Whenever you critically hit an enemy, your chance to critically hit is increased by {COM_1_VAL0_COM_0_VAL1}% for {COM_1_VAL0_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}, but you also become {COM_1_VAL0_COM_1_VAL1}% more vulnerable to being critically hit.

data.name: Centuries of Training
data.description: Upon striking a target with a direct damage ability there is a 25% chance to inflict an additional 252 Spirit damage over 3 seconds.
data.rawDescription: Upon striking a target with a direct damage ability there is a 25% chance to inflict an additional {ABIL_3995_COM_0_VAL0_TOD} Spirit damage over {ABIL_3995_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Clever Recovery
data.description:
If an enemy dodges any of your attacks, you will regain 75 Action Points.
This effect will not trigger more than once every 3 seconds.
data.rawDescription:
If an enemy dodges any of your attacks, you will regain {COM_1_VAL0_ACTIONPOINTS}.
This effect will not trigger more than once every 3 seconds.

data.name: Concealment
data.description: With luck and experience you are able to Dodge all ranged attacks and Disrupt all magic attacks against you for 7 seconds.
data.rawDescription: With luck and experience you are able to Dodge all ranged attacks and Disrupt all magic attacks against you for {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Counterstrike
data.description: A quick strike which deals 127 damage to your target and interrupts any ability that they were building up.
data.rawDescription: A quick strike which deals {COM_0_VAL0_DAMAGE} to your target and interrupts any ability that they were building up.

data.name: Discerning Offense
data.description: Your attacks have a 10% reduced chance to be defended against.
data.rawDescription: Your attacks have a {COM_0_VAL1}% reduced chance to be defended against.

data.name: Distracting Rebounds
data.description: Distracting Shot will now also affect any other enemies within 20 feet of your initial target.
data.rawDescription: Distracting Shot will now also affect any other enemies within {ABIL_9089_COM_2_RADI_FEET} of your initial target.

data.name: Distracting Shot
data.description: You Detaunt your target, making them hate you less and causing them to deal only 50% damage to you for 15 seconds.  If you attack anyone that you have Detaunted, the effect will immediately end.
data.rawDescription: You Detaunt your target, making them hate you less and causing them to deal only {COM_0_VAL0}% damage to you for {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}.  If you attack anyone that you have Detaunted, the effect will immediately end.

data.name: Draw Blood
data.description: An Ailment which deals 468 damage over 9 seconds.
data.rawDescription: An Ailment which deals {COM_0_VAL0_TOD_DAMAGE} over {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Eagle Eye
data.description: A well aimed arrow that deals 354 damage.
data.rawDescription: A well aimed arrow that deals {COM_0_VAL0_DAMAGE}.

data.name: Enchanted Arrows
data.description: Flame Arrow and Festering Arrow will now bypass all of your victim's resistances.
data.rawDescription: Flame Arrow and Festering Arrow will now bypass all of your victim's resistances.

data.name: Expert Skirmisher
data.description: Your cast times are reduced to 50% when you are within 20 feet of your target.
data.rawDescription: Your cast times are reduced to {COM_0_VAL0}% when you are within 20 feet of your target.

data.name: Exploit Weakness
data.description:
A Crippling attack which deals 252 damage and knocks down your target for 3 seconds.
If you are Vengeful, then cooldown is decreased by 10 seconds.
data.rawDescription:
A Crippling attack which deals {COM_0_VAL0_DAMAGE} and knocks down your target for {COM_1_DURA_SECONDS}.
If you are Vengeful, then cooldown is decreased by 10 seconds.

data.name: Explosive Shots
data.description:
All of your ranged attacks will explode for the next 10 seconds, dealing 300 damage to all enemies within 20 feet of your target.
This effect will not trigger more than once every second.
data.rawDescription:
All of your ranged attacks will explode for the next 10 seconds, dealing {COM_1_VAL0_DAMAGE} to all enemies within {COM_1_RADI_FEET} of your target.
This effect will not trigger more than once every second.

data.name: Eye Shot
data.description:
A Crippling shot that deals 116 damage, reduces your target's Initiative by 50 for 20 seconds, and knocks the target down for 3 seconds.
If you are Vengeful, then cooldown is decreased by 10 seconds.
data.rawDescription:
A Crippling shot that deals {COM_0_VAL0_DAMAGE}, reduces your target's Initiative by {COM_1_VAL0} for {COM_1_DURA_SECONDS}, and knocks the target down for {COM_2_VAL0_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}.
If you are Vengeful, then cooldown is decreased by 10 seconds.

data.name: Fell The Weak
data.description:
Deals 641 damage if your target is below 30% hit points, or 332 damage otherwise.
If you are Vengeful, then this attack deals spirit damage.
data.rawDescription:
Deals {COM_0_VAL0_DAMAGE} if your target is below 30% hit points, or {COM_1_VAL0_DAMAGE} otherwise.
If you are Vengeful, then this attack deals spirit damage.

data.name: Festering Arrow
data.description:
Deals 733 Corporeal damage to your target.
If you are Vengeful, then this attack is undefendable.
data.rawDescription:
Deals {COM_0_VAL0_CORPOREALDAMAGE} to your target.
If you are Vengeful, then this attack is undefendable.

data.name: Flame Arrow
data.description:
An Ailment which deals 178 Elemental damage to your target and then explodes, dealing an additional 267 Elemental damage over 9 seconds to the target and all other enemies within 20 feet of them.
If you are Vengeful, the radius is increased by 10 feet.
data.rawDescription:
An Ailment which deals {COM_0_VAL0_ELEMENTALDAMAGE} to your target and then explodes, dealing an additional {ABIL_3928_COM_0_VAL0_TOD_ELEMENTALDAMAGE} over {ABIL_3928_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS} to the target and all other enemies within {ABIL_3928_COM_0_RADI_FEET} of them.
If you are Vengeful, the radius is increased by 10 feet.

data.name: Flanking Shot
data.note:
Requires Skirmish Stance
Target must be facing away from you
data.description:
Deals 316 damage to your target. This ability will continue to build up even if you move. Only usable from behind the target.
The critical chance of the ability is increased by the percentage of life lost on the enemy target.
data.rawDescription:
Deals {COM_1_VAL0_DAMAGE} to your target. This ability will continue to build up even if you move. Only usable from behind the target.
The critical chance of the ability is increased by the percentage of life lost on the enemy target.

data.name: Flee
data.description:
You run away from the battle in a mad panic, increasing your run speed by 30 for 10 seconds. You immediately lose all of your action points, any career mechanic points, and your Morale will begin to drop, and you will not begin to regain action points until 10 seconds have passed.

You can use this ability again to cancel the effect early, but you will still remain panicked and will not regain action points for the full duration.
data.rawDescription:
You run away from the battle in a mad panic, increasing your run speed by {COM_0_VAL0} for {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}. You immediately lose all of your action points, any career mechanic points, and your Morale will begin to drop, and you will not begin to regain action points until {COM_4_VAL0_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS} have passed.

You can use this ability again to cancel the effect early, but you will still remain panicked and will not regain action points for the full duration.

data.name: Focused Mind
data.description: For the next 10 seconds, you will remove and ignore any rooting, snaring, disarming, silencing or disabling effects. Your cast times are reduced by 50%, and you cannot be set back.
data.rawDescription: For the next 10 seconds, you will remove and ignore any rooting, snaring, disarming, silencing or disabling effects. Your cast times are reduced by 50%, and you cannot be set back.

data.name: Glass Arrow
data.description:
All Path of the Scout abilities deal an additional 150 damage, but will drain 15 AP each time this effect triggers.
Will not trigger more than once every second.
Use this ability again to deactivate it.
data.rawDescription:
All Path of the Scout abilities deal an additional {COM_0_VAL0_DAMAGE}, but will drain {COM_1_VAL0} AP each time this effect triggers.
Will not trigger more than once every second.
Use this ability again to deactivate it.

data.rawDescription: Deals {COM_0_VAL0_DAMAGE} to your target.

data.name: Hail of Doom
data.description: You focus on a spot on the ground, shooting arrows at that spot every 0.5 seconds for 5 seconds, hitting all enemies within 20 feet of that area for 300 damage as long as you maintain your concentration.
data.rawDescription: You focus on a spot on the ground, shooting arrows at that spot every {COM_1_FREQ_SECONDS} for {COM_1_DURA_SECONDS}, hitting all enemies within {COM_1_RADI_FEET} of that area for {COM_1_VAL0_DAMAGE} as long as you maintain your concentration.

data.name: Hunter's Fervor
data.description: An inspired fervor fills your group, giving 5 AP every second for 9 seconds to all groupmates within 100 feet of you.
data.rawDescription: An inspired fervor fills your group, giving 5 AP every second for {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS} to all groupmates within 100 feet of you.

data.name: Instill Fear
data.description: You deal 1200 damage to all enemies within 30 feet and staggers the target for up to 6 seconds, preventing all actions unless they are damaged.
data.rawDescription: You deal {COM_0_VAL0_DAMAGE} to all enemies within {COM_0_RADI_FEET} and staggers the target for up to {COM_1_VAL0_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}, preventing all actions unless they are damaged.

data.name: Instinctive Aim
data.description: Increases your Strength, Ballistic Skill, and Weapon Skill by 120, but reduces your Toughness by 120.
data.rawDescription: Increases your Strength, Ballistic Skill, and Weapon Skill by {COM_0_VAL0}, but reduces your Toughness by {COM_1_VAL0}.

data.name: Keen Arrowheads
data.description: Increases the durations of Broadhead Arrows to 21 seconds, Takedown to 15 seconds, and Flame Arrow to 15 seconds.
data.rawDescription: Increases the durations of Broadhead Arrows to 21 seconds, Takedown to 15 seconds, and Flame Arrow to 15 seconds.

data.name: Leading Shots
data.description: Any time you critically hit with a ranged attack, the chance to critically hit will be increased by 8% for 10 seconds for group members within 100 feet, but this will not affect you.
data.rawDescription: Any time you critically hit with a ranged attack, the chance to critically hit will be increased by {COM_1_VAL0_COM_0_VAL1}% for {COM_1_VAL0_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS} for group members within 100 feet, but this will not affect you.

data.description: Removes all Hexes, Curses, Cripples, and Ailments from you.  You regain 250 Action Points.
data.rawDescription: Removes all Hexes, Curses, Cripples, and Ailments from you.  You regain {COM_4_VAL0_ACTIONPOINTS}.

data.rawDescription: Increases your Ballistic Skill by {COM_0_VAL0}.

data.rawDescription: Increases the critical damage of your direct damage Path of Assault abilities by 50% and the critical chance of Swift Strikes and Draw Blood by 25%.

data.rawDescription: Eagle's Eye and Festering Arrow now builds up {COM_1_VAL0_SECONDS} faster.

data.name: No Respite

data.rawDescription: Your damage is increased by {COM_0_VAL0}% when under 45 feet away from your target.

data.rawDescription: A Crippling attack that deals {COM_0_VAL0_DAMAGE} and disarms your target for {COM_1_DURA_SECONDS}, making them unable to use melee or ranged weapons.

data.name: Point-Blank
data.description: A mid-range attack that deals 600 damage and knocks the targeted player away. Monsters will be knocked down.
data.rawDescription: A mid-range attack that deals {COM_0_VAL0_DAMAGE} and knocks the targeted player away. Monsters will be knocked down.

data.rawDescription: Increases the armor penetration of all Path Of The Skirmisher attacks by {COM_0_VAL0}%.

data.rawDescription: You repeatedly shoot arrows at the ground for {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}, dealing {COM_1_VAL0_DAMAGE} every second to all enemies within {COM_1_RADI_FEET} of that spot.

data.name: Rapid Fire
data.description:
You move with blinding speed as you quickly fire several shots at your target, dealing 106 damage to the enemy twice per second for up to 3 seconds. This effect will end if you break your concentration, or run out of action points.
If you are Vengeful, then the shots will deal 10% more damage.
data.rawDescription:
You move with blinding speed as you quickly fire several shots at your target, dealing {COM_1_VAL0_DAMAGE} to the enemy twice per second for up to {COM_1_DURA_SECONDS}. This effect will end if you break your concentration, or run out of action points.
If you are Vengeful, then the shots will deal {COM_0_VAL0}% more damage.

data.name: Replenishing Strikes
data.description: Any time you critically hit an enemy, you will regain 40 Action Points. Tactic can not trigger more than once every 3 seconds.
data.rawDescription: Any time you critically hit an enemy, you will regain {COM_1_VAL0_ACTIONPOINTS}. Tactic can not trigger more than once every 3 seconds.

data.name: Scout Stance
data.description:
A long-distance bow stance that increases your Ballistic Skill and Initiative by 80 and the range of your bow attacks by 10%.

You may only use a single Stance at a time.
data.rawDescription:
A long-distance bow stance that increases your Ballistic Skill and Initiative by {COM_0_VAL0} and the range of your bow attacks by {COM_1_VAL1}%.

data.name: Shadow Sting
data.description:
An Ailment which deals 498 damage to your target over 9 seconds and causes all healing effects used on them to become 50% weaker. Only usable on a target that is already Ailing.
If you are Vengeful, this attack is undefendable.

An Ailment which deals {COM_0_VAL0_TOD_DAMAGE} to your target over {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS} and causes all healing effects used on them to become 50% weaker. Only usable on a target that is already Ailing.
If you are Vengeful, this attack is undefendable.

data.name: Shadowstep
data.description: You merge with the shadows and appear on your target within the blink of an eye. For the next 10 seconds your defences will be increased by 25%. Cant be used if there is a too big height difference between you and your target or if you are airborne.
data.rawDescription: You merge with the shadows and appear on your target within the blink of an eye. For the next 10 seconds your defences will be increased by 25%. Cant be used if there is a too big height difference between you and your target or if you are airborne.

data.name: Sinister Assault
data.description: Brutal Assault will now bypass all of the target's armor.
data.rawDescription: Brutal Assault will now bypass all of the target's armor.

data.name: Skirmish Stance
data.description:
A close-range bow stance that increases your Toughness by 80 and the chance that your bow attacks will critically hit by 5%. You gain the ability to autoattack while moving while in this stance.

You may only use a single Stance at a time.
data.rawDescription:
A close-range bow stance that increases your Toughness by {COM_0_VAL0} and the chance that your bow attacks will critically hit by {COM_1_VAL1}%. You gain the ability to autoattack while moving while in this stance.

You may only use a single Stance at a time.

data.name: Swift Strikes
data.description:
You unleash a punishing series of attacks on your enemy for up to 3 seconds, striking them twice per second and dealing 79 damage per hit. If the target is building up an ability, then your strikes will deal 142 damage instead. This ability will end if you break your concentration or run out of action points.
If you are Vengeful, then duration is incraesed to 5 seconds.
